delivery.body: {{#xml_dsig}}{{#private_key}}$YOUR_CERTIFICATE_TOKEN{{/private_key}},<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"><soap:Header><wsse:Security xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd" soap:mustUnderstand="1"><wsse:BinarySecurityToken EncodingType="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-soap-message-security-1.0#Base64Binary" ValueType="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-x509-token-profile-1.0#X509v3" wsu:Id="X509-3E5D1C8A2BD32B76FC15492835563731">{{#binary_security_token}}{{#certificate}}$YOUR_CERTIFICATE_TOKEN{{/certificate}}{{/binary_security_token}}</wsse:BinarySecurityToken><ds:Signature xmlns:ds="http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#" Id="SIG-3E5D1C8A2BD32B76FC15492835563925"><ds:SignedInfo><ds:CanonicalizationMethod Algorithm="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n#"><ec:InclusiveNamespaces xmlns:ec="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n#" PrefixList="soap"/></ds:CanonicalizationMethod><ds:SignatureMethod Algorithm="http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmldsig-more#rsa-sha256"/><ds:Reference URI="#id-3E5D1C8A2BD32B76FC15492835563914"><ds:Transforms><ds:Transform Algorithm="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n#"><ec:InclusiveNamespaces xmlns:ec="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n#" PrefixList=""/></ds:Transform></ds:Transforms><ds:DigestMethod Algorithm="http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#sha256"/><ds:DigestValue/></ds:Reference></ds:SignedInfo><ds:SignatureValue /><ds:KeyInfo Id="KI-3E5D1C8A2BD32B76FC15492835563862"><wsse:SecurityTokenReference wsu:Id="STR-3E5D1C8A2BD32B76FC15492835563883" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"><wsse:Reference URI="#X509-3E5D1C8A2BD32B76FC15492835563731" ValueType="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-x509-token-profile-1.0#X509v3"/></wsse:SecurityTokenReference></ds:KeyInfo></ds:Signature></wsse:Security></soap:Header><soap:Body xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd" wsu:Id="id-3E5D1C8A2BD32B76FC15492835563914"><requestMessage xmlns="urn:schemas-cybersource-com:transaction-data-1.150"><merchantID xmlns="urn:schemas-cybersource-com:transaction-data-1.150">$YOUR_MERCHANT_ID</merchantID><merchantReferenceCode>$YOUR_MERCHANT_REFERENCE_CODE</merchantReferenceCode><clientLibrary xmlns="urn:schemas-cybersource-com:transaction-data-1.150">Java XML</clientLibrary><clientLibraryVersion xmlns="urn:schemas-cybersource-com:transaction-data-1.150">6.2.6</clientLibraryVersion><clientEnvironment xmlns="urn:schemas-cybersource-com:transaction-data-1.150">Linux/4.15.0-43-generic/Azul Systems, Inc./1.8.0_201</clientEnvironment><customerID>12345</customerID><billTo><firstName>{{ credit_card_first_name }}</firstName><lastName>{{ credit_card_last_name }}</lastName><street1>{{ credit_card_address1 }}</street1><city>{{ credit_card_city }}</city><state>{{ credit_card_state }}</state><postalCode>{{ credit_card_zip }}</postalCode><country>{{ credit_card_country }}</country><email>{{ credit_card_email }}</email></billTo><item><unitPrice>12.34</unitPrice></item><item><unitPrice>56.78</unitPrice></item><purchaseTotals><currency>USD</currency></purchaseTotals><card><accountNumber>{{ credit_card_number }}</accountNumber><expirationMonth>{{ credit_card_month }}</expirationMonth><expirationYear>{{ credit_card_year }}</expirationYear></card><ccAuthService run="false"/><afsService run="true"/></requestMessage></soap:Body></soap:Envelope>{{/xml_dsig}}
